description: AIM Toolkit is a ramdisk and image-mounting toolkit for Windows, intended to replace ImDisk Toolkit and fix compatibility issues with recent Windows versions.
notes: AIM Toolkit is dedicated to ramdisk creation and mounting of image files of hard drives and CD-ROMs.
It is intended to fix compatibility issues of ImDisk Toolkit with recent versions of Windows.
- .NET Framework 4.8 (included in Windows 10 1903+ ) for image file mounting
